description: Texas redbud (Cercis canadensis var. texensis 'Oklahoma') is a stunning plant species that is native to the prairies of Texas. Its vivid, deep red buds appear in the early spring providing a captivating contrast to its bright green, heart-shaped foliage. Through fall and winter, Texas redbud expresses its beauty with clusters of pink flowers for all to admire. This hardy shrub provides brilliant color and an interesting structure to any landscape, making it an amazing addition to any garden. Above all, Texas redbud adds a unique sense of character and vibrance that is sure to wow onlookers.
